mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT m.MOVIE_TITLE AS movieTitle, m.RUNTIME AS runtime, b.BOOK_NO AS bookNo, b.BOOK_COST AS bookCost, b.BOOK_TOTAL_COST AS bookTotalCost, b.COST_PROCESS AS costProcess, COUNT(*) AS totalTickets, s.SCREEN_NAME AS screenName, LISTAGG(ss.SEAT_NO, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ss.SEAT_NO) AS seatNo, p.PLAYTIME AS playtime, p.PLAYTIME + (m.RUNTIME / 1440) AS endTime FROM BOOKING b JOIN BOOKING_SEAT bs ON b.BOOK_NO = bs.BOOK_NO JOIN PLAYING p ON bs.PLAYING_NO = p.PLAYING_NO JOIN MOVIE m ON p.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO JOIN SCREEN s ON p.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO JOIN SCREEN_SEAT ss ON bs.SSEAT_NO = ss.SSEAT_NO WHERE b.STATUS = 'Y' AND b.USER_NO = #{userNo} GROUP BY m.MOVIE_TITLE, m.RUNTIME, b.BOOK_NO, b.BOOK_COST, b.BOOK_TOTAL_COST, b.COST_PROCESS, s.SCREEN_NAME, p.PLAYTIME, (p.PLAYTIME + (m.RUNTIME / 1440)) ORDER BY p.PLAYTIME DESC

SELECT m.MOVIE_TITLE AS movieTitle, s.SCREEN_NAME AS screenName, p.PLAYTIME AS playtime, b.MODIFY_DATE AS modifyDate, b.BOOK_COST AS bookCost FROM BOOKING b JOIN BOOKING_SEAT bs ON b.BOOK_NO = bs.BOOK_NO JOIN PLAYING p ON bs.PLAYING_NO = p.PLAYING_NO JOIN MOVIE m ON p.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO JOIN SCREEN s ON p.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO WHERE b.STATUS = 'N' AND b.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY p.PLAYTIME DESC
